name: Dr Pepper
flavor_profile: Original blend of 23 flavors with spicy, fruity and vanilla notes
notes: Flagship flavor created in Waco, Texas.

name: Diet Dr Pepper
flavor_profile: Low calorie version of original Dr Pepper
notes: Modern branding of the original Sugar-Free Dr Pepper diet formula.

name: Dr Pepper Zero Sugar
flavor_profile: Zero sugar version of original Dr Pepper with a blend of non caloric sweeteners
notes: Launched with Original, Cherry and Cream Soda variants.

name: Caffeine Free Dr Pepper
flavor_profile: Original Dr Pepper taste without caffeine
notes: Caffeine free formulation that followed the Pepper Free branding introduced in 1982.

name: Caffeine Free Diet Dr Pepper
flavor_profile: Diet Dr Pepper taste without caffeine
notes: Diet counterpart to Pepper Free and Caffeine Free Dr Pepper.

name: Dr Pepper Cherry
flavor_profile: Original Dr Pepper with added cherry flavor
notes: Part of the core flavored lineup in the US.

name: Dr Pepper Cherry Zero Sugar
flavor_profile: Cherry flavored Dr Pepper with zero sugar
notes: Launched as part of the Dr Pepper Zero Sugar lineup.

name: Dr Pepper & Cream Soda
flavor_profile: Blend of original Dr Pepper with vanilla cream soda flavor
notes: Dessert style variant described as rich and vanilla forward.

name: Dr Pepper & Cream Soda Zero Sugar
flavor_profile: Blend of Dr Pepper and cream soda with zero sugar
notes: Zero sugar version of Dr Pepper & Cream Soda.

name: Cherry Vanilla Dr Pepper
flavor_profile: Dr Pepper with added cherry and vanilla flavors
notes: Combines cherry and vanilla notes with the original formula.

name: Diet Cherry Vanilla Dr Pepper
flavor_profile: Low calorie cherry vanilla version of Dr Pepper
notes: Diet counterpart to Cherry Vanilla Dr Pepper.

name: Dr Pepper Made with Real Sugar
flavor_profile: Dr Pepper sweetened with cane sugar instead of high fructose corn syrup
notes: Introduced for the 125th anniversary and replaced Heritage Dr Pepper.

name: Dr Pepper Strawberries & Cream
flavor_profile: Strawberry and cream flavors added to the original Dr Pepper taste
notes: First permanent cream based fruit flavor in the lineup.

name: Dr Pepper Strawberries & Cream Zero Sugar
flavor_profile: Zero sugar version of Dr Pepper Strawberries & Cream
notes: Uses zero sugar sweeteners with the same strawberries and cream profile.

name: Dr Pepper Blackberry
flavor_profile: Dr Pepper with added blackberry flavor, tart and sweet
notes: Introduced as a permanent fruity flavor in 2025.

name: Dr Pepper Blackberry Zero Sugar
flavor_profile: Zero sugar version of Dr Pepper Blackberry
notes: Zero sugar sibling of Dr Pepper Blackberry.

name: Pepper Free
flavor_profile: Caffeine free version of Dr Pepper marketed as Pepper Free
notes: Original branding for caffeine free Dr Pepper line introduced in the early 1980s.

name: Dietetic Dr Pepper
flavor_profile: Early low calorie formulation of Dr Pepper
notes: One of the earliest diet soft drinks marketed in the 1960s, predecessor to Sugar-Free and Diet Dr Pepper.

name: Sugar-Free Dr Pepper
flavor_profile: Zero sugar version that later evolved into Diet Dr Pepper
notes: Introduced in 1962 and later rebranded as Diet Dr Pepper.

name: Dublin Dr Pepper
flavor_profile: Dr Pepper made with cane sugar bottled in Dublin, Texas
notes: Popular cane sugar variant produced by Dublin Bottling Works until a 2012 trademark settlement.

name: Dr Pepper Energy
flavor_profile: Dr Pepper flavor combined with energy drink style caffeine and taurine
notes: Energy drink style variant sold in some European markets.

name: Dr Pepper Ten
flavor_profile: Mid calorie Dr Pepper with about ten calories per serving
notes: Marketed with the slogan "It’s Not for Women" and later discontinued due to low sales.

name: Dr Pepper Red Fusion
flavor_profile: Cherry forward variant of Dr Pepper with a red tint
notes: Early 2000s cherry variant that developed a cult following.

name: Dr Pepper Berries & Cream
flavor_profile: Dr Pepper with added berry flavors like blueberry and raspberry plus cream
notes: Limited time flavor later discontinued but still remembered by fans.

name: Diet Dr Pepper Berries & Cream
flavor_profile: Diet version of Dr Pepper Berries & Cream
notes: Diet counterpart to Berries & Cream, noted in coverage of the flavor’s launch and discontinuation.

name: Dr Pepper Dark Berry
flavor_profile: Original Dr Pepper with dark fruit flavors like black currant, blackberry and black cherry
notes: Released for Spider Man Far From Home in 2019 and brought back for Jurassic World Dominion in 2022.

name: Dr Pepper Dark Berry Zero Sugar
flavor_profile: Zero sugar version of Dr Pepper Dark Berry
notes: Zero sugar Dark Berry variant sold during Jurassic World Dominion promotion.

name: Dr Pepper Vanilla Float
flavor_profile: Dr Pepper with strong vanilla and ice cream float like character
notes: Introduced as a summer 2014 limited edition, later brought back seasonally.

name: Dr Pepper Creamy Coconut
flavor_profile: Dr Pepper with tropical coconut and a creamy finish
notes: Limited time summer flavor inspired by the dirty soda trend, returned for subsequent summers.

name: Dr Pepper Creamy Coconut Zero Sugar
flavor_profile: Zero sugar version of Dr Pepper Creamy Coconut
notes: Zero sugar release alongside the original Creamy Coconut flavor.

name: Dr Pepper Fansville Reserve Bourbon
flavor_profile: Dr Pepper with sweet, savory and woody bourbon inspired notes plus cherry and vanilla
notes: Non alcoholic bourbon flavored Dr Pepper released in limited cans tied to the Fansville football campaign.

name: Diet Dr Pepper Cherry Chocolate
flavor_profile: Diet Dr Pepper with added cherry and chocolate flavors
notes: Limited edition diet only flavor recalled fondly by fans.

name: Dr Pepper Fantastic Chocolate
flavor_profile: Original Dr Pepper with added chocolate flavor as a 24th note
notes: Promo flavor tied to football, available through Pepper Perks rather than stores.

name: Dr Pepper Hot Take
flavor_profile: Spicy take on original Dr Pepper with pepper style heat
notes: Limited edition Pepper Perks exclusive flavor described as a fiery twist on the original.
